first_para: Richard Alan Younger-Ross (born Richard Alan Ross, 29 January 1953, Surrey) is a politician in England. He was the Liberal Democrat Member of Parliament for Teignbridge from 2001 to 2010, having contested the seat in 1992 and 1997, finally winning in the 2001 election. He was defeated in the redefined Newton Abbot constituency in 2010 election.

full.extract: Richard Alan Younger-Ross (born Richard Alan Ross, 29 January 1953, Surrey) is a politician in England. He was the Liberal Democrat Member of Parliament for Teignbridge from 2001 to 2010, having contested the seat in 1992 and 1997, finally winning in the 2001 election. He was defeated in the redefined Newton Abbot constituency in 2010 election.
full.title: Richard Younger-Ross
